before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"akoqg","text":"Input Amount Requirement: 10 ng–1 μg DNA-free total RNA quantified by Qubit® Fluorometer and quality checked by Bioanalyzer. The protocol is optimized for approximately 200 bp RNA inserts. To generate libraries with longer RNA insert sizes, refer to Appendix (manual) for recommended fragmentation times and size selection conditions.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":26}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":260,"length":6}],"data":{}},{"key":"5m5s5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c80t7","text":"Keep all the buffers on ice, unless otherwise indicated.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"7C067892EA8511EDB4840A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.neb.com/-/media/nebus/files/manuals/manuale7760_e7765.pdf?rev=7b7833e3bb9548a5ac1086cba557ba1b\u0026hash=2D525B0B57E2A35CA646B3FCB3CFDE85"}}}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"9nqje","text":"The NEBNext Ultra II Directional RNA Library Prep Kit for Illumina contains the enzymes and buffers required to convert a broad range of input amounts of RNA into high quality directional (strand-specific) libraries for next-generation sequencing on the Illumina platform. The fast, user-friendly workflow has minimal hands-on time and is compatible with poly(A) mRNA enrichment and rRNA depletion methods.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"6kskl","text":"Section 1","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2fhfq","text":"RNA Sample Requirements\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":23}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fnj51","text":"RNA Integrity:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"36dkj","text":"Assess the quality of the Input RNA by running the RNA sample on an Agilent Bioanalyzer® RNA 6000 Nano/Pico Chip. For PolyA mRNA enrichment, high quality RNA with a RIN score \u003e 7 is required.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4hcm9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dp7a5","text":"RNA Sample Requirements:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":24}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cgs88","text":"The RNA sample should be free of salts (e.g. Mg2+, or guanidinium salts, divalent cation chelating agents (e.g. EDTA or EGTA) or organics (e.g. phenol or ethanol). RNA must be free of DNA. gDNA is a common contaminant from RNA preps. It may be carried over from the interphase of organic extractions or when the silica matrix of solid phase RNA purification methods is overloaded. If the total RNA sample may contain gDNA contamination, treat the sample with DNase I to remove all traces of DNA (DNase is not provided in this kit). After treatment with DNase I the enzyme should be removed from the sample. Any residual activity of the DNase I may degrade the oligos necessary for the enrichment. DNase I can be removed from the extraction using phenol/chloroform extraction and ethanol precipitation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":47,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ehduu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2v6c6","text":"The protocol is optimized for approximately 200 bp RNA inserts. To generate libraries with longer RNA insert sizes, refer to Appendix (manual) for recommended fragmentation times and size selection conditions. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":135,"length":6}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"63F6396AEA8511EDB4840A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.neb.com/-/media/nebus/files/manuals/manuale7760_e7765.pdf?rev=7b7833e3bb9548a5ac1086cba557ba1b\u0026hash=2D525B0B57E2A35CA646B3FCB3CFDE85"}}}}
